title: From farm to table: Hog processing in action @UncleTimsFarm

tasks.task: Prepare and harvest two pigs for processing.
subtasks: Confirm the pigs' weight at 300 pounds each.
Choose a simple skinning process instead of scalding.
Hang the pigs in the cooler for processing.

tasks.task: Process and package the harvested pigs.
subtasks: Grind the meat twice for sausage consistency.
Mix seasonings into the ground meat.
Store the processed meat in freezers.
Account for additional sausage needed beyond initial processing.
Plan to use bones for bone broth.
